actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Parks, Preservation and Recreation.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources; Senate Subcommittee on Parks, Preservation and Recreation. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 104-375.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into an appropriate form of agreement with, the town of Grand Lake, Colorado, authorizing the town to maintain permanently a cemetery in the Rocky Mountain National Park.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to enter into an agreement with the town of Grand Lake, Colorado, to authorize the town to maintain a cemetery within the boundaries of Rocky Mountain National Park.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into an appropriate form of agreement with, the town of Grand Lake, Colorado, authorizing the town to maintain permanently a cemetery in the Rocky Mountain National Park.
